description: The Gravity Recovery and Climate Experiment (and Follow-on) mission developed by NASA and the German Research Centre for Geosciences (GFZ) provide information on the amount of water stored on land though measurements of the Earth’s gravity field.

links.title: Global Gravity-based Groundwater Product (G3P) Groundwater Storage Anomalies
Global Gravity-based Groundwater Product (G3P) Terrestrial Water Storage

title: GRACE
